select
from wechat_messageresponse where USERID =#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REQUESTTYPE NOT IN('auto','subscribe','click')

mapper.insert: insert into wechat_messageresponse (USERID, KEYWORD, REQUESTTYPE, RESPONSETYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, PICTURE, LINKURL) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requesttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
